Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at California
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at California due to police department activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at California due to police department activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Such as the #52 Kedzie /California, #56 Milwaukee, or #66CHicago

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
